name: macOS Text-to-Speech
description: Speaks text aloud using macOS 'say' command. Available voices can be found by running 'say -v ?' in terminal, common voices include: Alex (default), Daniel, Karen, Samantha, Victoria
author: Shinkai

text.description: Text content to be spoken. Can include punctuation for natural speech patterns

voice.description: System voice name (run 'say -v ?' for list). Common: Alex, Daniel, Karen. Default: Alex

success.description: True if text was spoken through system audio, false if voice not found or audio failed

message.description: Details about speech synthesis result, includes voice used or error if failed
